sentences.cn: 早该从全球视角考虑问题了。

sentences.cn: 制造能力已经相应缩减。

sentences.cn: 许多从业者都采用浮动制计费。

sentences.en: Once you are done, group all the ellipses, scale and place them on the leaf shapes.
sentences.cn: 一旦你这样做， 鼐集团所有的省略号， 规模和将它们放在叶片形状。

sentences.en: one cannot suddenly scale up a laboratory procedure by a thousandfold.

sentences.en: Some rural schools have 50 pupils, while at the other end of the scale are city schools with nearly 5,000 pupils.
sentences.cn: 某些农村学校只有50名学生，而规模大的城市学校却有近5,000名学生。

sentences.en: The British aid programme is small in scale.
sentences.cn: 英国的援助项目规模不大。

sentences.en: The fighting is threatening to turn into full-scale war.
sentences.cn: 这场战斗有可能会演变为全面的战争。

sentences.en: The map, on a scale of 1:10,000, shows over 5,000 individual paths.
sentences.cn: 该地图以1：10,000的比例尺显示了5,000多条不同道路。

sentences.en: The patient rates the therapies on a scale of zero to ten.
sentences.cn: 患者按十分制给这些治疗方法打分。

sentences.en: The police can only guess at the scale of the problem.
sentences.cn: 警方只能猜测问题的严重性。

sentences.en: The result was human suffering on a huge scale.
sentences.cn: 结果是人类遭遇深重的灾难。

sentences.en: The scale of the problem is horrifying.
sentences.cn: 问题之严重令人震惊。

sentences.en: The scale of the problem is massive.
sentences.cn: 这个问题涉及面广泛。

sentences.en: The scale of the problem is now universally recognised.
sentences.cn: 现在全世界的人都已认识到了这个问题的严重性。

sentences.en: This weekend's fighting is threatening to burst into full-scale war.
sentences.cn: 本周末的冲突有升级成全面战争的危险。

sentences.en: we should have thrown on the other scale all that was moderate in the Liberal Party as well.
